H

handleMouseDragged(int, int) - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.BoardPanel
This method is invoked when the mouse is dragged.
handleMouseDragged(int, int) - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.EditorBoardPanel
Due to supporting also the adding/deleting of tokens while dragging, this method simply forwards to handleMouseMoved and handleMouseReleased.
handleMouseExited() - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.BoardPanel
Releases the current cursorPostionField so that this field is not highlighted after a repaint.
handleMouseMoved(int, int) - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.BoardPanel
This method is invoked when the mouse is moved.
handleMouseMoved(int, int) - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.EditorBoardPanel
Sets the current cursorPostionField so that this field is highlighted after a repaint.
handleMouseMoved(int, int) - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.GameBoardPanel
Sets the current cursorPostionField so that this field is highlighted after a repaint.
handleMouseReleased(int, int) - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.BoardPanel
This method is invoked when the mouse is released.
handleMouseReleased(int, int) - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.EditorBoardPanel
Releasing the mouse indicates that a token is either being about to be deleted, moved or added.
handleMouseReleased(int, int) - Method in class atomica.ui.util.board.GameBoardPanel
Releasing the mouse indicates that either a new atom was selected to being moved or an already selected atom shall be placed on a destination field.
Help - Class in atomica.objects
Simple class holding the resource information for help files considering the language.
Help() - Constructor for class atomica.objects.Help
Creates a help object.
help - Variable in class atomica.ui.HelpPanel
The help object holding the url to the help file.
Help.HelpLanguage - Enum in atomica.objects
The supported languages of the game.
Help.HelpLanguage() - Constructor for enum atomica.objects.Help.HelpLanguage
 
HelpPanel - Class in atomica.ui
Displays the html help considering the language.
HelpPanel(Help, ActionListener) - Constructor for class atomica.ui.HelpPanel
Creates a help panel displaying the help file given by the url holding the help parameter.
heuristic - Variable in class atomica.logic.pathfinding.Node
The heuristic cost of this Node
